uttarakhand.name: Uttarakhand
uttarakhand.description: The Devbhoomi (Land of Gods) where sacred Himalayan peaks meet holy rivers like Ganga and Yamuna. This land is blessed with ancient temples, spiritual centers, and rich Garhwali-Kumaoni culture.

himachal.name: Himachal Pradesh
himachal.description: The land of snow-capped mountains where apple orchards meet green valleys. Himachal is famous for its vibrant hill culture, colorful traditional attire, and warm hospitality.

nepal.name: Nepal
nepal.description: Home of Mount Everest and birthplace of Buddha, where Hindu and Buddhist traditions have flourished together for centuries. Nepal is known for its rich Sherpa culture and unique mountain heritage.

about.title: About Pahadi Heritage
about.missionText: Pahadi Heritage is dedicated to preserving and promoting the rich cultural traditions, history, and natural beauty of the Pahadi regions - Uttarakhand, Himachal Pradesh, and Nepal.
services: Document and share tribal history and cultural heritage
Connect travelers with authentic mountain accommodations
Help Pahadi communities find life partners within their culture
Promote traditional festivals and cultural events
Preserve folk music and oral traditions
Guide visitors to explore geographical and cultural sites
